description:
The Colliers International company announces opening of the Associate Director vacancy.

 

Main responsibilities

 

  • Perform analysis for all Capital Markets mandates and prepare best-in-class commercial proposals
  • Ensure timely delivery to the Clients the best materials and results
  • Proactively talk and negotiate with landlords, investors and potential buyers
  • Take responsibility for execution of the projects
  • Support Directors in transaction processes
  • Liaise with clients, investors and other third parties
  • Coordinate legal documents for instruction from mandating till fee payment
  • Provide excellent Client management on execution level as well
  • Coordinating the work of analysts assigned to a project
  • Due diligence process coordination
  • Reporting (projects reports preparation)

Requirements to the candidates:


  • Higher economics/finance/real estate education, MBA or other relevant education is preferred;
  • 5+ years of relevant working experience in real estate investment
  • Proven track record in Real Estate Capital Markets on a relevant position is essential;
  • Successful experience in structuring, and execution of complex transactions on investment real estate market;
  • Fluency in English (both written and oral);
  • Russian language is essential;
  • Strong negotiation, presentation skills, excellent numerical and analytical skills, result-oriented approach, commitment to client service and good team player.
  • Strong strategic thinker, excellent communicator, ambitious and driven, commercially astute, responsive and responsible.

If you are interesting in the position and meet our requirements we are glad to offer you:


  • An interesting and perspective job in the international company
  • Work in a dynamic, professional, friendly team
  • Excellent opportunities for your development and professional growth
  • Work in the comfortable office in the center of Moscow
name: Associate Director
